article_title: Health Costs Soar For Employers Outside The U.S.

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Corporations outside the U.S. are generally seeing double-digit percentage rate increases between 9 and 20 percent in part because government coverage doesn’t pay for all a patient’s healthcare needs and workers turn to their employer to pick up the remaining tab, a new report shows. In many cases, the medical cost [...]
